alert.note: Alert for Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:50AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wyandotte and Leavenworth Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 649 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near McLouth to near Vinland. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Leavenworth, Lansing, Merriam, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Tonganoxie, Basehor, Edwardsville, Lake Quivira, Kansas City, Linwood, Reno, Fairmount, Fort Leavenworth, Wolcott, Pomeroy, Beverly Hills, Muncie and Maywood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 417. Interstate 435 between mile markers 9 and 18. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
